title: Big Zesty Buttermilk Dressing
source: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
categories: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
ingredients: 1tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, or more if you like
2teaspoons gochugaru (Korean chile flakes) or other red chile flakes
½teaspoon kosher salt (Diamond Crystal or about half as much Morton), or more if you like
directions: Mix all the ingredients together well. If you want, add more salt and lemon.
It keeps in the fridge for up to 10 days.
